rows.label: tev000193_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's good to see that you're learning your way around
the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's been a while since I've had a chance to stroll
through the commercial district like this. It's made
quite an impression on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0004
rows.name:
How about you? I can't help but wonder how you see
this city of ours, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_JNK0010
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: tev000193_SEL0011
rows.name: Answer that it's just like being back on Earth.

rows.label: tev000193_JNK0020
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: tev000193_SEL0021
rows.name: Comment on humans and xenoforms living together.

rows.label: tev000193_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: tev000193_SEL0031
rows.name: Grill Nagi about when the city will finally be finished.

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0005
rows.name:
Heh heh. I guess even an amnesiac can sense how
much New LA feels like home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0006
rows.name:
Of course, we can't recapture the scale of an actual
Earth city overnight. New LA will need time to grow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0007
rows.name:
But it isn't nostalgia that moved me earlier.
I was struck by something else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0008
rows.name: Mira is the first planet we humans have ever colonized.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0009
rows.name:
Even as we struggle with the Ganglion and the missing
Lifehold, we've managed to ally with xenoforms and
eke out a fairly good existence as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0010
rows.name:
As I gaze upon this natural landscape, seeing passing
humans and xenoforms interacting peacefully with one
another, it starts to restore my faith.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0011
rows.name: Perhaps this universe isn't so wretched after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0012
rows.name:
I was struck by the exact same thing.
It's truly wonderful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0013
rows.name: Mira is the first planet we humans have ever colonized.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0014
rows.name:
Even as we struggle with the Ganglion and the missing
Lifehold, we've managed to ally with xenoforms and
eke out a fairly good existence as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0015
rows.name:
As I gaze upon this natural landscape, seeing passing
humans and xenoforms interacting peacefully with one
another, it starts to restore my faith.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0016
rows.name: Perhaps this universe isn't so wretched after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0017
rows.name: Heh. You don't mince words, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0018
rows.name:
I certainly hope you aren't that...pointed when you're
speaking with the director general.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0019
rows.name:
With BLADE claiming so much of the city's manpower,
the construction teams are seriously understaffed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0020
rows.name:
As a result, the city itself is progressing at a relatively
sluggish pace. I think that's something we'll just have
to endure for the foreseeable future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0021
rows.name:
However, I'm well aware that this city will be too small
for all of us once we reclaim our real bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0022
rows.name:
At that point, we plan to enlist the help of our new
xenoform friends and strive to complete projects at
a more aggressive pace. Here's hoping for the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0023
rows.name:
In any case, if you don't mind, I'm going to walk
around this area a little bit more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm here looking for a teacup that I can keep in your
section of the barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000193_MSG0025
rows.name: It's been a pleasure, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
